message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $12,000. Given its worth to you, we're confident it could significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its true value and the potential it holds for you, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon.
